title: How to Connect a Game Boy Advance to a Nintendo Gamecube

steps.headline: Buy a Nintendo GameCube–Game Boy Advance link cable.
steps.description: You can buy one on sites such as Amazon and eBay.

steps.headline: Connect the part that looks like a GameCube controller port into one of the GameCube's slots.
Connect the other part (the one that looks like a triangle) into the Game Boy Advance/Game Boy Advance SP.
Put two games that are compatible with each other into their systems.
Start the games, and follow their instructions to connect them with each other.

text: Buy a Nintendo GameCube–Game Boy Advance link cable. You can buy one on sites such as Amazon and eBay. Connect the part that looks like a GameCube controller port into one of the GameCube's slots.  Connect the other part (the one that looks like a triangle) into the Game Boy Advance/Game Boy Advance SP.  Put two games that are compatible with each other into their systems.  Start the games, and follow their instructions to connect them with each other.
